author: cms-sw
body:
As discussed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/43652 , this PR 
- adds psABI micro architecture support e.g. `x86-64-v2, x86-64-v3,  x86-64-v4`
- Disables vecgeom multi-arch build as we build Vecgeom in Scalar mode
- Disable multi micro-archs builds for alpaka rocm/cuda backends
title: Support for psABI micro architectures
